translation: Fire, light, daytime, the bright fortnight, the six months of the northern path of the sun (the northern solstice) departing, then men who know Brahman go to Brahman.
commentary: 8.24 Agni: fire? Jyotih light? Ahah day? Shukla: the bright fortnight? Six months six months? Uttarayana the northern path of the sun? There there? departed departed? Are they going to go? Brahma to Brahman? Brahmavidah knowers of Brahman? People people.Commentary Is this the UttaraMarga or Devayana? the northern path or the path of light? by which the Yogis go to Brahman. This path leads to salvation. It takes
